items.sentence: I haven\'t bought Tom a Christmas present yet.
I haven\'t yet bought Tom a Christmas present.
Tom eats lunch at this restaurant quite often.
Tom and Mary seem to be fighting all the time.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to pay the rent.
Tom doubts that Mary can take care of herself.
Tom isn\'t the only friend Mary has in Boston.
Tom isn\'t the only person that has done that.
Several things are happening at the same time.
You\'re not as important as you think you are.
